title: Knitbone Pepper Ghost Dog and the Last Circus Tiger
description: Roll up! Roll up! The circus is coming to Starcross, and Knitbone Pepper and his ghostly animal friends can't wait! But amidst the magicians, the acrobats and clowns, Knitbone senses somehting beastly in the big top...A wonderfully warm, whimsical series, jam-packed with mayhem, chuckles and woofs!
author: Claire Barker
